tool_description: Indian Pincode or Postal code API provides the 29 states and seven territories pincodes data with latitude and longitude details. You can get the nearby area of pincodes, pincodes by districts, distances between two pincodes, nearby area and distance between pincodes by latitude and longitude information. There are 20k pincodes data available in this API.
name: India Pincode with Latitude and Longitude
title: India Pincode with Latitude and Longitude
tool_name: India Pincode with Latitude and Longitude

api_list.name: DistanceBetweenTwoLat,Lng
api_list.description: This api returns the distance between two latitudes and longitudes

utterances.utterance: What is the distance between the coordinates 10.958721, 79.385975 and 13.0222, 80.223240?
Calculate the distance from latitude 12.9716, longitude 77.5946 to latitude 13.0827, longitude 80.2707.
Find the distance between the points 22.5726, 88.3639 and 23.2599, 77.4126.
What is the distance from 15.3173, 75.7139 to 17.3850, 78.4867?
Calculate the distance between 26.9124, 75.7873 and 25.5941, 85.1376.
How far apart are the coordinates 11.0168, 76.9558 and 13.0827, 80.2707?
Find the distance from 21.1702, 72.8311 to 22.3072, 73.1812.
What is the distance between 23.0225, 72.5714 and 19.0760, 72.8777?
Calculate the distance from 18.5204, 73.8567 to 15.2993, 74.1240.

api_list.name: DistanceBetweenTwoPincodes
api_list.description: This api returns the distance between two Pincodes.

utterances.utterance: What is the distance between pincode 110001 and 400001?
Can you tell me how far pincode 560001 is from 600001?
Find the distance between pincode 700001 and 500001 in kilometers.
How many miles are there between pincode 380001 and 110001?
Calculate the distance from pincode 600001 to 700001.
What is the distance in kilometers between pincode 400001 and 560001?
How far is pincode 500001 from 380001 in miles?
Please provide the distance between pincode 110001 and 600075.
Tell me the distance from pincode 700001 to 400001.
What is the distance in miles between pincode 600001 and 500001?

api_list.name: NearByAreasByPincode
api_list.description: This api returns the neary areas details (including area name, district, city, latitude and longitude) of the nearby given Pincode.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://india-pincode-with-latitude-and-longitude.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/pincode/600001/nearby"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "india-pincode-with-latitude-and-longitude.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://india-pincode-with-latitude-and-longitude.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/pincode/{pincode}/nearby"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "india-pincode-with-latitude-and-longitude.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
